attributes.action: david cameron pledgeing 800 million pound to pakistan schools when there hiding militant islam groups and got a nuclear weapon programe
attributes.additional_details: i would like it discussed that of why david cameron and the coalition goverment pledged 800 million pound to pakistan at the start of the of the year 2011 for new schools when theyve done nothing but help militant islam i.e the taliban al Qaeda hide in there country not only that pakistan has a nuclear weapons programe does the new coalition goverment not understand this pledge of 800 million pound would help support there nuclear weapons programe and get back handed so many times it would go in to the hand of corrupt pakistani officials not only this were making cuts in are own military and nhs where this money could surely benefit are own economy
